page.title: 20Recreation in Cronton
page.content: {Recreation}Organised leisure activities in the immediate area are limited. Most people we asked seemed to provide their own recreational activities. {Spectator sports}People interested in rugby or soccer travel to either Widnes or Liverpool to watch matches. The majority of people support sport via their television, which is present in most homes. {Organised sport}There are village football teams. Badminton and keep fit are held in the village community centre. Locally there are golf,tennis, cricket,rugby and swimming clubs. The pubs provide snooker, darts and bowls. {Recreation at home}Many people provide their own hobbies, some of those mention are: jogging,knitting,walking, cooking,sewing,reading,cycling,fishing music,gardening.Some now own computer.
